title: Looking for a typeface that indicates motion
content:
howdy from austin, tx... I'm having some trouble locating a typeface for a project.

i'm usually very much a traditionalist when it comes to type selection, this project is requiring that i cast a wider net (hopefully someone here would be kind enough to offer their expertise).

the feeling the face needs to communicate is one of strength and speed. the closest thing i could find was the Propel drink logo (see here) [http://www.dontgetlost.ca/raid/Propel%20logo.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20130813202704/http:/www.dontgetlost.ca/raid/Propel%20logo.JPG "http://www.dontgetlost.ca/raid/Propel%20logo.JPG")

its almost something like a sports team would have, i like the way the propel logotype utilizes subtle motion indicators without looking garish.

i would be most appreciative of any help that could be offered. thank you.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Propel logo.JPG\_.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130813202704/http:/typophile.com/files/Propel%20logo.JPG__0.jpg) | 34.16 KB |
author: joshfinto

comments.content:
[Rezident](http://web.archive.org/web/20130813202704/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/linotype_rezident_virtual/)  
 [Bullet](http://web.archive.org/web/20130813202704/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=8)  
 [FF Blocker](http://web.archive.org/web/20130813202704/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_blocker/)  
lean [FF Motter Festival](http://web.archive.org/web/20130813202704/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_motter_festival/)

maybe [Pneuma](http://web.archive.org/web/20130813202704/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/pneuma/)

you could do a few things to make [Crillee](http://web.archive.org/web/20130813202704/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/elsner_flake/crillee/) look less dated

Comic Sans faux italic with speed serifs. Not an actual suggestion, but it will make all the other choices seem a little better.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130813202704im_/http:/typophile.com/files/comicspeed_4567.gif)
